name: 3dfractionize
author: AFNI Developers
description: For each voxel in the output dataset, computes the fraction of it that is occupied by nonzero voxels from the input.

inputs.description: Use dataset as a template for the output. The output dataset will be on the same grid as this dataset.
inputs.name: Template Dataset

inputs.description: Use dataset for the input. Only the sub-brick #0 of the input is used.
inputs.name: Input Dataset

inputs.description: Clip off voxels that are less than the specified occupancy fraction.
inputs.name: Clip Fraction

inputs.description: Dataset that provides a transformation (warp) from +orig coordinates to the coordinates of the input dataset.
inputs.name: Warp Dataset

inputs.description: Preserve the nonzero values of input voxels in the output dataset rather than creating a fractional mask.
inputs.name: Preserve Nonzero Values Flag

inputs.description: Vote for which input value to preserve when using the preserve flag.
inputs.name: Vote for Preservation Flag

output-files.description: Output dataset with the specified prefix.
output-files.name: Output Dataset
